website_summaries.verdict: Solid replacement for builder-grade toilets. Meets low flow codes and easy to install.
pros: Strong flush for a low flow model

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is the worst toilet you could possibly buy. As you can see from the photo, there is a line in the bowl that looks like a hard water ring. It is not. It is where the sanigloss material meets regular porcelain. It has been there since day one. I thought I could live with it, since the toilet does flush well and is quiet. But now after 16 months, I'm done!!! I have been diligent about keeping these things clean to no avail. Nothing works. I bought three of these nightmare toilets and will now have to replace all of them..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toilet is not 15 to 16 inches to seat as ...
customer_reviews.text: Toilet is not 15 to 16 inches to seat as stated. This was an expensive costly mistake an my Mom who is disabled has to deal with the seat being a lot smaller than claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful flushing action!
customer_reviews.text: In the Consumer magazines, this toilet was rated as one of the highest pressure flushes among the top brands. So we purchased two of them because we have low water pressure as our house is built on piles, 16 ft. up! Well the ratings were right on and these toilets work great! The tank is much smaller than our old toilets, which would seem to indicate that they use less water per flush too. The toilets are bright white. We purchased the plastic TOTO slow closing seats, which work well too.
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect toilet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toilet! We put up with one that clogged and was easily soiled for a very long time. It's nice not to worry about that any more. I will buy 2 more Toto's to replace other toilets in our home. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the height. Couldn't get all the features it has in a higher toilet. We are average height people but it's too low for our liking. Our old toilet was about an inch higher and you can really tell the difference when you go to sit down.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could love a toilet. Then I bought this Toto! It's everything it claims to be. I intend to replace every toilet in my home with one of these. This is also a really good price for this. I initially had some trouble, it arrived damaged/cracked. But the seller's customer service was great, they shipped a replacement at no cost to me that arrived within 2 days. I emailed Sat, had a replacement coming Monday, arrived Wednesday. I matched it with a great purple seat and now own the coolest most comfortable commode I've ever encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Loved first so bought another
customer_reviews.text: Tired of plugged up toilets as I was. We just bought the second Toto toilet. First one I don't think has ever plugged. Our originals often would. American makers could take a lesson from Toto. We spent a lot for the original American toilet and it didn't perform. Tank filler valves are very unusual looking but perform same function as all filler valves. We ordered the Toto slow closing seat and I don't like it. It feels like cheep plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in every way except for one
customer_reviews.text: Awesome in every way except for one: the anti-siphone cap assembly will degrade and will need to be replaced every couple of years. I have three drakes in my house because I thought they are great. They are, except for this one part. Look for reviews on the replacement part the 528T value assembly. I suppose all things will break and need replacement but this is a certainly. Two of my three toilets has experienced the same fate within months of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr

customer_reviews.title: TOO NOISY
customer_reviews.text: I am just a bit disappointed in my toilet purchase. I wish there was a “active toilet” showroom somewhere where you could flush and listen! Where as this flushes adequately enough , it’s too loud for my liking. Sounds like too much air is getting sucked down the hole and it gurgles! The tank is a bit wobbly as well! We will be doing a remodel on our guest bath....that’s where this toilet will be moved to!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the residue left after flushing and the sanigloss ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the residue left after flushing and the sanigloss coating seems non existent on my unit, which I did pay for. I would not purchase another Toto.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch009988

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toilet and flushes well and uses very little water
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toilet and flushes well and uses very little water. The problem with this toilet is the holes for the toilet seat are not lined up correctly and the toilet seat sits crooked because of that. Had a replacement sent and it has the same issue. It is not from the toilet seat as we've tried two different seats and also the toilet seats are straight on our older toilet in the home. Would have given it 5 stars if the holes had been lined up well enough to have the seat sit straight.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Let us now praise famous toilets
customer_reviews.text: Does all that it promises. I have an old house, with old plumbing and local ordinances that limit how much water can be used for each flush. Frequent fly had to resort to the bucket, which I really hated. This TOTO uses less than the legal amount of water, and really performs. No more buckets, plungers,or warning guests about what happens when they need the bathroom. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: New Silk

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok my old made in China toilet that came with the house often (quite often!) required more than one flush. Sometimes up to 5 flushes and that's no joke. This Toto has always flushed in exactly one flush. I've had this for several months of daily usage and it NEVER fails to flush in one flush, no matter what we throw at it. You can tell some serious engineering went into this toilet. Very highly recommend. Good quality is more expensive but wow is it worth it. Going to replace the other 2 toilets in my house with the same Toto next year!
customer_reviews.author: Ray H

customer_reviews.title: Easily cleaned (as-advertised)
customer_reviews.text: Flushes strongly. Easily cleaned (as-advertised). I have... unusually wide bowel movements. This copes with 95% of what I pass, but the extra 5% is notably easy to clear with an ordinary toilet plunger and very little work. I couldn't say if its the finish, the trapway shape, or what that makes it easy, but it's considerably easier than my old toilet to clear.
customer_reviews.author: ML Tross

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean itself withevery flush!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in November 2017 so I have had one and a half years experience. The Amazon web page states "SanaGloss : Super smooth, ion barrier glazing cleans your toilet bowl with every flush". This is NOT true. I have spent more time cleaning skid marks off the bowl with this toilet that my old (20 years old) porcelain ones. Other than this issue, the toilet works well!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gray

customer_reviews.title: You know you're getting old when you find yourself bragging about your new toilet.
customer_reviews.text: And I have bragged about this toilet, to several people. This toilet not only uses considerably less water than my current commodes, it sends everything down with a single flush every time. I've yet to have a clog or a backup. When I re-do the other bathrooms in my house I will definitely be getting two more of these.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Groat

customer_reviews.title: 90 days without cleaning, will I post a photo?
customer_reviews.text: I have not touched this toilet since I installed it the day it arrived. No cleaner, no additives, nothing. It has the no-stick treatment and I got the high flow valve. There is slight hard water stain. Any organic deposits would disappear after a couple flushes. Incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Flush Valve is cheaply made and not up to Toto normal standards
customer_reviews.text: Toilet itself is fine, but just over one year after installation, the valve began to malfunction - pulsing and filling erratically. Seller was notified, and I was told warranty is only for one year. So do not expect to get more than one year out of the flush valve, because it is cheaply made to fail after about a year or so and will not be covered by the warranty after one year.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Vasicek

customer_reviews.title: Flushes every time-first time
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with this toilet. After checking the reviews on Consumers Reports and Amazon we changed both of our condo toilets, which had very poor flushing capabilities. These Toto units are fabulous. Fairly low water usage, never miss a flush,and quiet. The action is interesting, almost like a pressure toilet, but extremely efficient. We've had them for couple of months so far and intend to buy some more for our house. I had these professionally installed as we had the plumbers in for some more extensive work. Installation was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael John

customer_reviews.title: just a very satisfied customer. If you choose a different brand
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of those items that should be a household word. I've gone through probably 6-8 commodes in my years and this unit blows them all away. Would never purchase another brand if I had a choice. No ties with company or those who sell them, just a very satisfied customer. If you choose a different brand, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: connortn

customer_reviews.title: Never worry about flushing with full strength
customer_reviews.text: This toilet has absolutely NO problem flushing and removing all the waste. There is one thing to note. Although it flushes great and I have no worries that it will do the job, there is the problem of "streaks" in the bowl. Because the water level is not as high volume as I would like, it has a tendency of leaving "streaks". So, have a bowl brush handy and give it a clean and re-flush. *** Its nice to be considerate and clean up after yourself, so others don't have to view the unsightly stains ***
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toilet.
customer_reviews.text: This elongated toilet replaces a round bowl we were using from another manufacturer, Kohler. The Toto flushes pretty quietly, though not quite as quietly as the Kohler did. The water flow around the inner rim of this Toto seems better at preventing mildew from forming around the inner rim, though this is a fairly recent purchase for us, so we will need to see if this remains true over time. The flush is clean and powerful, limiting the need for separate flushes for waste and for paper. I installed this toilet myself with no difficulty, following the clear instructions from Toto.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer_66

customer_reviews.title: "No clog toilet" that clogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the premise that it was the "no clog toilet". Boy was I wrong. My son is forever backing up the toilet and this one is no exception. I was thinking that this would make the perfect Father's Day gift since he would no longer have to snake the drain but alas, that is not the case. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Magic mama

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading the reviews and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Was afraid to buy a toilet off Amazon, but I couldn't resist w/free 2 day shipping. Arrived on time in 2 large boxes, each piece was fully surrounded in thick styrofoam. Plumber installed it on 9/2015, it's still working great. The Sanagloss inside definitely keeps it cleaner than our other American Standards. Just a warning if your house has thin walls though, it has a loud (yet powerful) flush. We didn't purchase matching seat, any elongated one will do.
customer_reviews.author: Surf Mama

customer_reviews.title: leaves marks on wall after use
customer_reviews.text: I've had the toilet for over a year now. I need to brush it quite often as anytime you go #2, there is a 75% chance that remnants will remain on the toilet wall. Other than that, the flush is pretty good and it has never clogged.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chen

customer_reviews.title: What’s with the noise
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so disappointed by a product this highly rated. The noise this toilet makes when the tank is replenishing the water it uses for a flush is terrible. The plumber couldn’t believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, the customer doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: It met all the customers demands for low flow, and single flush operation. It replaced a Kohler toilet. It cleans solids out of the bowl in one flush whereas many competitors need two or three flushes. The customer was not happy in that she cannot use scouring type cleaners on the bowl due to its ultra smooth glaze which aides in the flushing operation. Other than that, it is perfect. I would put it in my house any day.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Love Toto!
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet I ever owned. I don;'t miss plunging once a week at all. Well worth the extra money. It was delivered much faster than expected(2 Days) and was well packaged with no issues at all. It could probably be installed by the homeowner but I chose to use a Plumber for peace of mind. A very good investment if you have had flushing issues.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: ... owned this toilet for almost 2 years and have loved it. I can't remember ever having to plunge
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this toilet for almost 2 years and have loved it. I can't remember ever having to plunge. Before this toilet purchase, I was plunging 2-3 times a week! No joke! Same people and eating habits....no plunging! Thank you!!!! Just a suggestion...I ordered the toilet and purchased the seat from home depot....not a good idea. The seat doesn't fit perfectly, which bugs me everytime I see the toilet. Purchase the toilet and the seat together for a seamless and perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdtimecharm

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: We have no replaced all our toilets with TOTO's. Much better than our old ones. The only person in our house of 5 that can stop them is my wife. Only because she uses an obscene amount of toilet paper. They have gone up in price a bit since we first bought but they are still worth it. If you buy a 100 dollar toilet you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my two Totos - one more to go and we're totally Toto
customer_reviews.text: I replaced one older toilet with a Toto about a year ago, primarily based on very high user and Consumers Reports ratings. The old toilet was prone to periodic clogging, necessitating use of the plunger or a snake to clear. I have not been disappointed with my Toto selection. It has worked 100% reliably during its first year, and I a few months ago, installed a second one in the guest bath, again with 100% reliability. I plan to buy a third one during the next year, and hopefully retire the plunger and snake forever.
customer_reviews.author: Vicw

customer_reviews.title: works great! but...
customer_reviews.text: Performs well in terms of what it will flush with one push of the lever. However, one push of the lever does not always leave the bowl completley clean-how to put it politely-some small "streaks" of "matter" are occasionaly still present after one flush UPDATE May 28, 2014: After owning it for over a year, it still works great in terms of what it will flush BUT-the problem with "matter" streaks being left is too much for someone in the house so I will be replacing it
customer_reviews.author: Peter Rusek

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome. Easy to install (be sure to purchase a ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. Easy to install (be sure to purchase a wax ring, as this is not included) and delivers as promised. Previous toilet was weak, to say the least. This TOTO delivers an efficient and powerful flush. We are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Toto..
customer_reviews.text: It's a Toto, it does what it's suppose to do, reliably. I had my doubts about the low low low flow but this toilet works fine. Good instructions and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Badenov

customer_reviews.title: Good But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This toilet, while not quiet, really flushes well, a plus if you live in a single story house without much drop in the plumbing. It is water-efficient, and quick to refill, but I cannot get it to fill the bowl to the supposed water line. Its main drawback is though it claims to have a surface that resists sticking, the toilet brush needs to be used way too much.
customer_reviews.author: Harold J. Harju

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for me. I could wish that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for me. I could wish that I got closer to a real 1.6 gallon/flush, but I'm guessing it's less than 1 , as the water height in tank goes down by just 1/3 or so. Adjusting chain didn't help me much. I read elsewhere on web that a blue colored Korky flush valve flapper would allow more of a flush, but can't find one locally, and really don't wish to pay another 10 - 15 bucks extra for a flapper. I could see the curves and narrowness of base being a possible problem for an un-level floor. But I haven't haven't had any rocking or leaks so far. Flush is quick and relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Knew nothing about TOTO when searching for a new toilet. The name caught my attention. I have since learned it is made in Atlanta, Georgia and is a company that is environmentally friendly. I also learned that the Ritz Carlton installs TOTO toilets as well as McDonalds, etc. If it works for those two companies, who's to second guess its quality. It works wonderfully. I have absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: roundhouse

customer_reviews.title: Third Toilet - works great
customer_reviews.text: I still can't quite figure out how it works so well. I've purchased two of this same toilet in the round version, and each flush is flawless. I never thought I'd like a toilet so much, but after our old high volume, toilet that seldom did the job on the first flush, I'm giddy! Also, the shiny surface is great for easy cleaning. Toto makes some much more expensive toilets and I'm sure they're great, but this one is an excellent value .
customer_reviews.author: DailyReader

customer_reviews.title: Zero clogs
customer_reviews.text: These are great toilets. Zero clogs since installing three of them. Not too noisy. Don't have the classic circular flush though, if you're emotionally connected to that (like my Mom)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer #42

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We were desperate to find a quality toilet as we are in the process of renovating our 23 year old house and the burgundy toilet that did not flush just had to go!! After much research on many different brands of toilets we decided to purchase a TOTO toilet. It arrived days earlier than we were quoted. My husband installed it and it worked so great that we purchased another one for our 2nd bathroom. It arrived today.... Days earlier than expected! I recommend this product to anyone searching for a quality good toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Went right in, has a very strong flush even though it's installed in a basement.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F.

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLE! best toilet ever....bar none. I'm not sure of exact operating guidelines but the way we use it is to simply touch and release flush handle for liquids and hold flush handle down for solids. it seems the "quick flush" uses perhaps a gallon whereas the held down handle releases the 1.6 gallons. I never would have thought such a toilet could be had for such a reasonable price. Also, the packaging and delivery was wonderful and the toilet seat is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet
customer_reviews.text: I had a 20 year old toilet that the builder put in with the house. This works so much better! Hasn't clogged at all over 6 months! Another reviewer posted a reference to a plunger on Amazon that works well with this toilet, and he was right! It is the Continental Mfg. Co. Plunger, 24in. Haven't had to use it, but I like knowing I have a plunger that will work on this toilet if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaunts

customer_reviews.title: it looked like the "American standard" I was replacing which is less ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday, installed in less than an hour. No problems. At first, it looked like the "American standard" I was replacing which is less than a year old and junk. Flipped on the water hit the handle- WHOOSH !!! Wow! What a flush, no kidding- man-o-man can this baby take a punch! Keep small children away from the bowl when flushing (don't want to loose any), and install one in every bathroom (That's what I intend to do.) Super duper
customer_reviews.author: lar321

customer_reviews.title: A perfect combination with my Toto washlet
customer_reviews.text: A perfect combination with my Toto washlet! Standard height was great since the washlet seat added extra height. I'm glad I bought this brand/ model.
customer_reviews.author: JB Allie

customer_reviews.title: The Toto was not glazed inside as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was supposed to be glazed inside but was not. Measurements were not available and the toliet did not allow space for baseboard heating. The base, at the very bottom, was okay but soon above the siphon was too close for the heating. My toilet was out so I did not take time to find out all the details I needed. I was able to get a 1.28 gal toilet off the shelf at a big box store that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: taoger

customer_reviews.title: Bowl wonder!
customer_reviews.text: great product! Don't think this thing will ever clog but it is not qualify for rebate in California, well at least not YET on the list for rebate. So a bit of concern about the tank is rocking when flush easy fix is shaping a piece of foam and glue it to the back of the tank (not the wall) and it will prevent the rocking thus will lead to future problem. Poor design for the tank but the bowl however is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: hankuruski

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Well made. But our installer could not get the tank to remain entirely vertical against wall -- had to put in a wedge to stabilize it. This occurred for 2 of them we purchased. Nonetheless, am likely to purchase another when time to replace our 3rd one. The sanigloss is not perfect -- sometimes matter sticks, but it often goes away after a few more uses and it's really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: freakmoots

customer_reviews.title: I BOUGHT 3 TOTO'S TO REPLACE THE TERRIBLE UNIVERSAL RUNDAL TOILETS THAT WERE INSTALLED WHEN THE HOUSE ...
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 3 TOTO'S TO REPLACE THE TERRIBLE UNIVERSAL RUNDAL TOILETS THAT WERE INSTALLED WHEN THE HOUSE WAS NEW. I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND TOTO. WE HAVE NEVER NEEDED A PLUNGER SINCE THESE WERE INSTALLED. AMAZON DID A GREAT JOB. TOILETS WERE VERY WELL PROTECTED WITH AMAZINGLY GOOD PACKING MATERIAL. THEY ALL ARRIVED TIMELY WITH ABSOLUTELY NO DAMAGE TO ANY OF THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Toto Drake is dependable according to my plumber!!!
customer_reviews.text: My plumber said use only Toto Drake so I've used him with no problems for 13 years, so Toto is my favorite brand. There are differences between this and Drake II - mine is just Drake.
customer_reviews.author: SPH

customer_reviews.title: Terrific toilet
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the original toilet furthest from the septic tank with the Toto. The pipe slope is gentle and old toilet usually required several flushes for solid material, even though it was older than the current lo-flow toilets. The Toto powerfully swallows the contents and has never needed a second flush.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is so much better than the one it replaced that I'm thinking of replacing some others. It clears the bowl in 2 seconds and refills the tank in 15. Its predecessor took around 90 seconds to refill. I couldn't be happier with this selection. Get a soft-close toilet seat to make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: P. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet and performs better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This toilet performs great and the flush is strong so you don't need to worry about clogging. It replaced a fairly new standard round-bowl toilet I had and going from that to this was night and day. I didn't expect it to be this much better since this is a fairly base model. Great toilet and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I'm a habitual toilet clogger unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I'm a habitual toilet clogger unfortunately, but it's handled it all like a champ!!! It flushes everything, but there are ummm... "footprints" left behind on the porcelain, (not the water). Just use a scrub brush and you're set. You all don't know how tempted I am to click the "add video" button on this review just to prove what this baby can handle. I'm like the Randy Marsh of Southern Arizona.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Flusher; However...
customer_reviews.text: If it's ADA height approved, it must be at their minimum (too low). And, as others have already noted, the "Sanagloss" is a joke (you'll spend plenty of time keeping the bowl "track-free"). Buy it for the flush (at which it excels). And be sure to get the "SoftClose" seat just for its entertainment value (it's fun to watch).
customer_reviews.author: LNsKC

customer_reviews.title: Nice toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I bought it to go with the Toto Washlet seat. The right height and well suited for the seat. Can you believe I bought a toilet from Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Lake House Granny

customer_reviews.title: Best Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet ever. Friends Stope are our house to use our toilet.
customer_reviews.author: buyerbennett

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, quick and clean
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than American Standard model I also have. Never clogs.
customer_reviews.author: PaulDoug

customer_reviews.title: Top quality construction and flushes
customer_reviews.text: Toto SaniGloss is a great improvement for toilets and this Drake works perfectly with my new Toto SW584#01 Washlet S350e Toilet Seat-Elongated with ewater+. The 'ewater+' adds the extra cleanliness to the bowl, a great combo!
customer_reviews.author: Gry_Sql

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our plumber
customer_reviews.text: We had a choice: fix an aging toilet or replace it. We decided to replace it and went with a recommendation from our plumber. Though so very different from our original toilet, this TOTO has proven to be comfortable, and the flush is efficient. I still don't understand why it doesn't come with a seat, which we had to order separately.
customer_reviews.author: P. Masserman

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet. Bought a different house and hated the existing toilets. Did some research and settled on these Drake toilets by Toto. Night and day difference in toilets. They work well and are easy to clean. I've never had a better toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Raider

customer_reviews.title: Took about an hour each to swap in
customer_reviews.text: Flushes great and refills quickly and quietly. No more rust stains from the cheap builder's grade toilets with the corroding tank bolts. Six stars if I could. I suspect the slow leak reported by some purchasers has been corrected. I bought three, and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Handles it ALL!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet flushes flawlessly EVERYTIME. It handles all amount of waste with no issues. Great toilet!
customer_reviews.author: SeattleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent simple toilet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent simple toilet, flushes and functions very well. Don't get one that uses less water unless you have to. This is the right amount for an effective single flush. Less water and you'll probably end up double flushing which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: aAnders Rundblad

customer_reviews.title: super quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the Standard we had before. It is a super quiet flusher. It doesn't have a lid. Also, get this plunger as others don't fit. > Korky 99-4A Max Performance Plunger, Small, Black <
customer_reviews.author: Dono

customer_reviews.title: Very good Toto toilet.
customer_reviews.text: It performs well, the flush is strong and cleans the bowl completely, unlike my previous one. It stays spotless for a long time without having to use the brush. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Nogueira

customer_reviews.title: Love this toilet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toilet. It flushes very well. It always looks clean especially with the Sanagloss coating. It cleans easily. The tank came with a small crack that was only noticeable when installed. Amazon sent me a whole new toilet immediately. Amazon service was great.
customer_reviews.author: TeriInABQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet
customer_reviews.text: We've had a new house for 3 years, and I've repeatedly had to double or triple flush, or plunge, or snake the original toilet to clear it. After installing this TOTO and three months of use, I have found that low water toilets can work 100% of the time. No problems what so ever. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good Toilet, but delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: The bowl was delivered broken. The merchant quickly sent replacement. It is really a nice toilet. Not fancy looking, but it works great. My kids used to clog the old toilet all the time. Not so frequent with this one, because it flushes well. Quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet!
customer_reviews.text: I looked a long time before purchasing this Toto toilet. It's hard to be excited about a toilet unless you've had overflow, etc. problems before, but I am excited about this one! The toilet works like a charm, and we haven't had any issues with it nor do we expect to in the future. We bought it in the fall of 2012.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B.

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Ride
customer_reviews.text: Installed it myself; saved a few hundred bucks. Works better than the previous mystery-brand toilet that was in the powder room. Next time I feel ambitious, I'll order a couple more and replace the rest of the porcelain Hondas in the house.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this toilet!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this toilet for a year now and hasn't backed up yet. With a 3 and 5 year old that's pretty impressive. My husband and I are pleased with this purchase and glad we payed the extra dollars for a better quality toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Toto Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toilet. Energy and water saving. Quiet, too. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Karry M. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this toilet to address a specific issue of large waste that consistently clogs my other toilets
customer_reviews.text: Clogged on first use! I purchased this toilet to address a specific issue of large waste that consistently clogs my other toilets. I am furious I wasted my money on this when my $89 toilet flushes better! Can you get your money back on an installed toilet used one time?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toilet seat(s) didn't align, had to return for a new one.
customer_reviews.text: I received the toilet and installed it immediately. When I tried to install the seat for the toilet, it was visibly not aligning with the bowl. I tried 3 different seats, all with the same result. I had to uninstall the toilet (a real pain) and returned it for a new toilet. I put the seat on first and it aligned just fine, so I installed it. The toilet works great now, but it sure was a lot of hassle.
customer_reviews.author: DavS

customer_reviews.title: The box that the toilet base was in was badly ...
customer_reviews.text: The box that the toilet base was in was badly damaged (inside of another box). My guess is someone at the warehouse damaged it but shipped it any way - the toilet base had a large black mark on it that the plumber had to remove with sandpaper.. It does not show too much. We had to install it since the plumber had already removed the old one.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: The best toilet!
customer_reviews.text: We are totally happy with this toilet. It flushes repidly and thoroughly with very little water. The bowl is always clean and we have been able to remove the plunger from our bathroom, we have never had it clog. Highly recommend. My husband was able to install by himself.
customer_reviews.author: chicsand

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter but she really does like the toilet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter but she really does like the toilet. It flushes well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This toilet consistently amazes me. Powerful fast flush clears the bowl and the tank refill is fast and quiet. Sanagloss seems to live up to its description as the bowl stays cleaner. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bluffdad

customer_reviews.title: This toilet is designed poorly. Simply put, it ...
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is designed poorly. Simply put, it flashes back when flush. My wife has been very mad at me because of this. I tried different ways to resolve it by reducing water in the tank(hope reducing the pressure of water etc), does not help. I then search around the internet, only found out many people complaint about the same issue. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: HappyFish10

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for the house we just sold. I will buy this again as soon as we are ready to replace the toilets in our new house. So easy to clean. I will not settle for any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kahn

customer_reviews.title: no leaks, quiet flush
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a couple months now. Seems quite reliable, no leaks, quiet flush. The sanagloss seems to be a better non-stick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Nels

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 sets when I had bath renovations. They all work well.
customer_reviews.author: Becky. H

customer_reviews.title: TOTO drake toilet is a great product
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is high quality, assembles easily, and seems to have the best flush of all gravity-flush toilets. I have three in my house, and when I have to replace a toilet in the apartments that I own, I use a TOTO drake.
customer_reviews.author: berkeley bell

customer_reviews.title: It works far bette than the Kohler toilet I replaced ...
customer_reviews.text: It works far bette than the Kohler toilet I replaced. I have had no problems with this toliet after 2 years. I would buy another one. In fact I did!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bowl wash isn't very good. Constantly have to use toilet brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Flushes like a boss!  Everything just vanishes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to match a Toto washlet we received as a gift, and it is an excellent toilet. The SanaGloss seems to actually hold up as advertised, but in all honesty I have only had it for a week so far, so can't speak to its long-term efficacy. But it installed easily, matched the washlet perfectly, no leaks, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: msj74

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toilet because I'd clog my old one about once a week. I can safely say that I haven't picked up a plunger since I purchased this toilet back in November 2012. Thanks TOTO!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best toilet ever!!!! Will replace our other toilets with this same one. Great quality and works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Beers

customer_reviews.title: Duh
customer_reviews.text: It is a toilet and it works, of course it's getting 5 stars. I am still sort of reeling that I actually purchased a toilet on amazon, though...
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hands down Totos are the best toilet on the market
customer_reviews.text: Hands down Totos are the best toilet on the market. Excellent flush technology.Very satisfied. This is my third Toto purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zendon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We've used it for over a year and it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the Drake
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet on the market. Plan on replacing my other two builders grade American Standards with this model.
customer_reviews.author: don59sox

customer_reviews.title: BYE BYE BROWNIES!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can flush a 12 lb s*** in less than a second!! Best toilet on the planet! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice online toilet lol.
customer_reviews.text: Toilet works fine, no issues, flushes fine, came packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: CryptixPhi

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Solved all my clogged toilet problems. Easy do it your self installation and a good price. Can't ask for anything better. Fast shipping and excellent packaging. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: This is the S***
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is it. This the real deal. it works well, even will massive dumps, the lid is the silent lid closure and this is an awesome toilet. comfy and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dingo

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional performance, appearance, price
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional toilet. Easy installation. Water consumption is minimal but flushing capacity is great. Noise is comparable older conventional toilets but very brief. Insulated walls for sound when remodeling bathroom and toilet cannot be heard when flushed, even in adjoining room. Best deal out there for the money in terms of performance and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: A.A.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a "Hot Potty!"
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toilet for my son to be installed in his new house. Unfortunately the shipment arrived at my son's house with a broken bowl. I immediately called Amazon costumer service and they assured me a replacement would be shipped a.s.a.p. Well, my son received it, maybe the very next day. This time everything was in tact. I must say, I have never been dissatisfied with Amazon's customer service and replacement policy. Their representatives have always been thoughtful and very courteous. This is a great toilet! Strong flush and not a lot of water is wasted. It is very well built! I recommend this to anyone who needs a "Hot Potty."
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brown

customer_reviews.title: toilet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flushing system. It looks great in our new bathroom. After searching several sights amazon gave us the best price for this high quality investment.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Felland

customer_reviews.title: The sanagloss is not as good as I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Smooth installation and powerful flush. The sanagloss is not as good as I anticipated, if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: beachappy

product_meta.title: TOTO CST744SG#01 Drake 2-Piece Toilet with Elongated Bowl and Sanagloss,1.6 GPF, Glazed Cotton White
product_meta.description:
Color:Glazed Cotton WhiteFROM THE MANUFACTURER
TOTO C744EG-01 This is a combination of Bowl along with ST743S-01 Tank and SS114-01 Seat (seat not included). High profile elongated close coupled toilet with 12-Inch rough-in. Low consumption (6 Lpf/1.6 Gpf) siphon jet flushing action. Tank with lid, fittings, chrome plated trip lever, less seat. With unrivaled vision and innovation expertise, TOTO leads and never follows in designing, engineering, refining and delivering innovative technology that enhances your daily life. TOTO's innovations translate into the best performance and ecology in the plumbing world. TOTO leaves nothing to chance when it comes to design. TOTO embraces holistic design principles because performance, quality, functionality and ultimately, customer satisfaction, are just as important as aesthetics. Backed by precision engineering and global manufacturing, great designs address functionality and performance as well as beauty. Attention to detail, continuous improvement, over a thousand research and development professionals and 90+ years of experience fuel TOTO's product quality. TOTO provides unmatched performance, durability and reliability, representing the ultimate in customer satisfaction for our toilets, faucets, lavatories, showers and products for the entire bathroom. Superior quality backed by over 90 years of experience creates many benefits. TOTO installations offer peace of mind and performance you can count on. Reliability translates into reduced maintenance costs and superior performance.
feature_bullets: High-profile two-piece elongated bowl and tank set
G-Max 1.6 GPF flushing system, creates a powerful flush
Cefiontect glaze gives the bowl a lubricious quality that helps prevent particles from adhering
Seat not included, Must be purchased separately
3 inch wide flush valve with extra-large siphon jet and a large trapway

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
